Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.base

Interface DriverProvider<T extends org.openqa.selenium.remote.AbstractDriverOptions<?>>

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseDriverProvider, ChromeDriverProvider, EdgeDriverProvider
public interface DriverProvider<T extends org.openqa.selenium.remote.AbstractDriverOptions<?>>
Defines a contract for WebDriver providers responsible for managing browser-specific configurations and instances.

Implementations of this interface should provide methods to:

  • Create browser-specific AbstractDriverOptions.
  • Apply default and headless arguments to WebDriver options.
  • Handle driver setup and download logic.
  • Instantiate WebDriver instances with configured options.

The generic type T represents a browser-specific configuration that extends AbstractDriverOptions. Implementations must define the specific WebDriver options required for a particular browser.

  • Method Details

    • createOptions

      T createOptions()
      Creates a new instance of browser-specific driver options.

      This method should return an instance of the browser options configured with necessary defaults.

      Returns:
      A AbstractDriverOptions instance containing browser-specific configurations.

    • createDriver

      org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver createDriver(T options)
      Creates and returns a new WebDriver instance using the provided options.

      This method initializes a new WebDriver based on the configured browser options and settings.

      Parameters:
      options - The browser-specific driver options.
      Returns:
      A configured instance of WebDriver.

    • applyDefaultArguments

      void applyDefaultArguments(T options)
      Applies default arguments to the provided driver options.

      This method configures default settings such as window size, timeouts, and other browser-specific capabilities.

      Parameters:
      options - The driver options to which default arguments should be applied.

    • applyHeadlessArguments

      void applyHeadlessArguments(T options)
      Applies headless mode arguments to the provided driver options.

      This method ensures the WebDriver runs in headless mode if required.

      Parameters:
      options - The driver options to modify for headless execution.

    • setupDriver

      void setupDriver(String version)
      Sets up the WebDriver by downloading the necessary binary if it has not already been downloaded.

      Implementations should ensure that the correct WebDriver version is downloaded and ready for execution.

      Parameters:
      version - The version of the WebDriver to download.

    • downloadDriver

      void downloadDriver(String version)
      Downloads the WebDriver binary for the specified version.

      This method should contain logic for fetching and installing the WebDriver for a given browser.

      Parameters:
      version - The WebDriver version to download.
